DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan 's alendronate sodium 10 mg tablet Merck 's Fosamax 10 mg tablet follow single , oral 40 mg ( 4 x 10 mg ) dose administration fasting condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fasting Study Alendronate Sodium Tablets ( 10 mg ) Fosamax Tablets ( 10 mg )
DOC.criteria: healthy , adult subject , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
